actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Expressing support for the designation of National Marina Day to honor America's marinas for their many contributions to their local communities and create awarness amongst citizens, policymakers, elected officials, and employees of the overall contributions of marinas to their well-being.

summary.text: Supports designation of National Marina Day (August 9, 2008) to honor the Nation's marinas.

titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of National Marina Day to honor America's marinas for their many contributions to their local communities and create awarness amongst citizens, policymakers, elected officials, and employees of the overall contributions of marinas to their well-being.
